title: WTB: N172 Trimmed and/or Skinned Kid Nichols and Billy Hamilton

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Trimmed and/or Skinned Kid Nichols and Billy Hamilton
posts.post_content:
I know it is a long shot but I was wondering if anyone has a N172 Kid Nichols or Billy Hamilton that has been trimmed and/or skinned for sale.  Whole examples are out of my price range.  If anyone has one of these please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  

Thanks

Tony
